Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Unlike the others, you have greater potentials.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Greater potential?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "That's right. Your bodies have a greater affinity to Tantalum-193, which means you can become Constructs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Constructs? What's a Construct? Are you turning us into robots?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Your bodies will be completely replaced, but your minds, the most human part of you, will be preserved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "That way, your physical bodies won't be defenseless like our flesh and blood against the Punishing Virus.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'You will obtain superhuman powers. You will become sparks. You will become our last hope.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Nikola looks at the two girls who are in each other's arms."}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'This is how you can truly protect those you love. Otherwise, your struggles in this broken world are futile.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You don't need her. I can be the Construct.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'All I want is to protect Luna. If I can do that, it will be enough.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Have you made up your mind?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia hears a voice behind her. Nikola looks past her toward Luna, who has been hiding behind Lucia.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Luna steps forward, moving past Lucia...'}
{3: "Lucia reaches out and grabs Luna's hand tightly, stopping her from stepping into the darkness."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I won't trust you anymore. I won't let Luna leave me again.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Nikola remains silent, but the menacing darkness behind him lunges toward the two girls.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'This is not a memory. This is the nightmare Lucia fears. Tragedies join together into a chain, bounding her to the tracks of fate.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'But at least she will not compromise this time.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before it is too late...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory1.jpg'}
{2: 'Hiro', 3: "Do it, Lucia. She's a Corrupted now. There's no saving her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hiro', 3: 'The only thing we can do is end her suffering.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The limbs of the Construct before her are torn away. She is infected with a highly-concentrated Punishing Virus.'}
{3: 'The ludicrous claims that Constructs\' bodies and minds "will be protected from the Punishing Virus" become "will withstand the Punishing Virus for a little bit longer" on the battlefield.'}
{3: 'It is too late by the time Lucia and Hiro arrive after following her distress signal.'}
{3: 'Her mutilated body crawls toward Lucia, her mouth making an inhuman shriek.'}
{3: 'Her artificial skin peels away as it scrapes against the ground, revealing her silver Tantalum frame.'}
{3: 'Her artificial heart beats forcefully, pumping the vital fluid out of a torn tubing and leaving behind a trail on the ground.'}
{3: "Lucia raises her katana, ready to bring an end to the infected Construct's torment."}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'L-Lucia...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Your sister, her procedure failed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'She has already been processed and disposed of...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'In the last stage of the experiment, an immensely strong Punishing Virus reaction appeared inside herâ€”it took over and corrupted her almost instantly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Which means that Luna became a Corrupted. We had to dispose of her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I'm sorry, but you won't be able to see her again.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory1.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Her blade strikes, and the Corrupted stops screaming.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I will always find her, no matter how long it takes. This will not be her end.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory10.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "That day wasn't my end. That was a new beginning.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'They were right about one thing, Lucia. The Construct body is capable of protecting the body and mind from the Punishing Virus.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'But becoming a Construct is not enough. You have to pass the filtering from the Ascension-Network.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The filtering from the Ascension-Network?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "We don't have to fear the Punishing Virus anymore. Through the filtering, we can control it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'That is our only way out.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "That is humanity's only way out.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory334.png'}
{2: '???', 3: "That is Earth's only way out."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia (?)', 3: 'This is the only way to realize your wish.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia (?)', 3: 'This time, you will gain the power to protect her for real.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I've heard something like that too many times.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Babylonia, Ravenge, you... You're all the same.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia slowly points her katana toward the doppelganger before her.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm not falling for that again.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory301.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Aaargh! Let me go! I was just checking on her.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sound of the outside world reaches her ears again. Lucia slowly opens her eyes.'}
{3: 'She finds Lamia stunned as Roland ties her up with his chain blade.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "I can't let you disrupt her. After all, approaching an Ascendant like this can take your life, even just from an unconscious reaction.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "It's not easy to find someone worthy.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "But didn't you say... Wait a minute. She... she's also an Ascendant?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Why is she like this, then? Didn't you say there's no more pain after becoming an Ascendant?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Like a frog thrown into a pot of boiling water, Lamia instinctively wants to leap away from Lucia.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Ouch... It hurts.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But she has clearly forgotten about the chain around her, losing her balance and falling flat on her face due to her giant tail fin.'}
{3: 'Wiggling her tail, she looks like a fish on dry land, flapping around in protest.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Let me go!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Let her go, Roland.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'That was the first time you said my name. What an honor.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Roland loosens the chain, and Lamia immediately stands up. She wants to approach Lucia, who spoke on her behalf, but Lucia's threatening appearance stops her in her tracks."}
{3: 'Standing between the two Ascendants, Lamia is not sure what to do with herself, waiting for them to speak.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Why do you want to become an Ascendant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia can deduce that Lamia met Roland long ago, judging from the snippets of conversations she heard.'}
{3: 'And the reason a Construct seeks an Ascendant is plain as day.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Because that's the only way to survive, isn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You'll become one of the Corrupted if you fail.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'What?! I can fail?!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lamia stares at the quiet Roland. He shrugs and smiles.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'His smile seems to have reminded Lamia of something horrible, and she slouches like a deflated balloon.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Whatever. What difference does it make? At least I have a chance to survive this way.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lamia says sluggishly.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'As long as I can survive.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'As long as you can survive, is it...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "I think you can't know if this is a tragedy until it is the curtain call.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's go back. The Babylonians might come back.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Roland contemplates the coldness in Lucia's voice before smiling inconspicuously."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Certainly. Luna will be delighted to see you return.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia notices her reflection when she walks past the display window of a boutique.'}
{3: 'Her thick, suffocating military uniform is tattered, and the color of her synthetic hair has faded. Even someone who knows her might not recognize her now.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Give me a second.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia pushes open the rotting wooden door to the shop. The antique copper bell above rings upon hitting the door.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "Luna's Ascendant group finds their fourth member that day, and Lucia finally sheds her heavy uniform.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3201_17.jpg'}
{3: 'Alpha is awakened by the sound of a bell similar to the one in her memories.'}
{3: 'She looks down to find a white kitten staring at her curiously. A bell hangs around its neck, ringing crisply as the cat shakes its flurry head.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Go away. I don't have anything for you."}
{3: 'Perhaps it has not seen other living things for a long time. It approaches Alpha upon hearing she speaks, rubbing her foot affectionately with no intention to leave.'}
{3: 'Alpha moves her leg to the other side, and the cat follows.'}
{3: 'After a few attempts, the kitten is still not relenting, even treating this as a game. Alpha sighs silently.'}
{3: 'She searches her pockets and finds some fishing bait.'}
{3: 'Crouching down, Alpha places some of it in her open palm.'}
{2: 'White Kitten', 3: 'Meow...'}
{3: "The white cat walks up to Alpha's palm and smells, its bell ringing."}
{3: 'Then it takes a small bite of the fish bait.'}
{3: 'Alpha does not try to pet the cat, nor does she retract her palm once the cat finishes its meal.'}
{3: 'She just lets the kitten lick her metal palm, and her furrowed brows relax.'}
{3: 'Ascendants are all driven by strong emotions and grand aspirations, more or less.'}
{3: 'They are either buried deep inside or presented proudly and openly.'}
{3: 'Whichever it is, they are the starting point that guides the Ascendants through the filtering.'}
{3: 'What was her starting point?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory365.png'}
{2: 'Dad', 3: 'You have a sister now, Lucia. You have to protect her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory366.png'}
{2: 'Mom', 3: 'Take Luna and go, Lucia. Protect her. Live.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'I can offer you a choice if you have someone you want to protect.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz113.jpg'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Lucia... become who you wants to be.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3201_17.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/UiSpine/UiMovieSpine/UiMovieLi/UiMovieLuxiyaAlphaTower.prefab'}
{3: 'Alpha stands up and leans on her motorbike and her threatening composure returns.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Go away.'}
{3: 'As if noticing the changes to the person before it or being intimidated by her composure...'}
{3: '...The white kitten quickly vanishes at the end of the street.'}
{3: "Alpha's wish has never changed. Luna is her only family."}
{3: 'Before Alpha became a Construct, she used to believe that Babylonia would give Luna a peaceful life.'}
{3: 'In the end, humans abandoned Luna for their own goals, and Alpha lost her for a while.'}
{3: "After she became a Construct, she thought Gray Raven could stop the same tragedy from happening again under Ravenge's leadership."}
{3: 'But his kindness was a mask that hid a poisonous heart, and she became a part of the tragedy herself.'}
{3: 'Did he really lose his arm because an infected member attacked him?'}
{3: 'Alpha will never know.'}
{3: "But she will not make the same mistake again. She will not entrust Luna's safety to someone else."}
{3: '...Even if it is the Ascension-Network, which gave Luna her power.'}
{3: 'Alpha stares at the blue spire in the distance and gets on her bike.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Wait for me, Luna.'}
{3: 'The engine thrums. Dust rises, concealing the lone, departing figure.'}
